Mod.Name: FFVIII Reloaded
Mod.Author: Mexico (ported by HobbitDur)
Mod.Description: Hard mod for FFVIII DESCRIPTION: The changes made to the game are numerous, so I won’t list them all here. Instead, I’ll let you discover them for yourself. However, here’s a brief overview to answer some of your questions: - Enemy stats and AI adjusted. - New bosses and enemies added. - Magic spells modified in both power and attributes. - GF abilities reworked and improved. - The card mod is only accessible on Disc 4 via an item and only if you’ve completed your collection. - Different enemy drops and magic steals, usually far less plentiful. - Magic draw points altered. - New side quests and changes to existing ones. - And much more…
